attributes.name: label
attributes.description: property to label the control. If provided, can be styled with ::part(label). (optional)

attributes.name: control-selector
attributes.description: property to help zui-formfield find the correct form control. Defaults to the first child element. (optional)

properties.name: label
properties.description: property to label the control. If provided, can be styled with ::part(label). (optional)

properties.name: controlSelector
properties.description: property to help zui-formfield find the correct form control. Defaults to the first child element. (optional)
